body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! My name is Kenneth Carter, and I am with Prestige Footwear. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kenneth, my name is Theresa Howard. I'm really angry because there's been a problem related to privacy with my recent purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm really sorry to hear that, Theresa. Protecting our customer's privacy is a top priority for us. Could you please provide me with some more details regarding this issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I noticed that my personal details were not properly secured on your website after making a purchase. It's very concerning.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Understood, and I apologize for any distress this has caused. For documentation purposes, could you let me know your email address associated with the purchase?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Theresa. And for further verification, could you also provide the last four digits of the phone number you used for this purchase?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. I will forward this to our security team immediately so they can investigate and ensure this won't happen again. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. I just hope this gets resolved quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, and we'll do everything we can to rectify this situation. Thank you for bringing this to our attention, Theresa. I appreciate your time and patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: If you have any more concerns, feel free to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
